metadata.title: CVE-2022-0987 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in PackageKit in the way some of the methods exposed bythe Transaction interface examines files. This issue allows a local user tomeasure the time the methods take to execute and know whether a file ownedby root or other users exists.

criterions.comment: packagekit package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
